title: Chicken Tortellini Soup With Zucchini and Tomatoes

content.eamr: ( ing-0 "1 recipe Fast Chicken Soup Base" )

content.text: 1 (9 ounce) package refrigerated small cheese tortellini
content.eamr: ( ing-1 "1 (9 ounce) package refrigerated small cheese tortellini" )

content.text: Salt and freshly ground black pepper
content.eamr: ( ing-6 "Salt and freshly ground black pepper" )

content.text: 2) Add these: 1 9-ounce package refrigerated small cheese tortellini; 1 14.5-ounce can diced tomatoes; 2 medium zucchini, diced; 1 tsp. dried basil.
content.eamr:
( inst-2 / R
	:inform ( ac-2-0 "Add"@3:6 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-1 "1 9-ounce package refrigerated small cheese tortellini"@14:68 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-2 "1 14.5-ounce can diced tomatoes"@70:101 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-3 "2 medium zucchini, diced"@103:127 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-4 "1 tsp. dried basil"@129:147 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 3) Then simmer for 10-20 minutes until tender.
content.eamr:
( inst-3 / R
	:inform ( ac-3-0 "simmer"@8:14 / AC
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
		:duration ( dur-3-0 "10-20 minutes"@19:32 / DUR )
		:until ( cond-3-0 "until tender"@33:45 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
	)
)

content.text: 4) Before removing from heat, stir in 1/2 cup chopped fresh parsley.
content.eamr:
( inst-4 / R
	:inform ( ac-4-0 "stir in"@30:37 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-5 "1/2 cup chopped fresh parsley"@38:67 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
		:duration ( cond-4-0 "Before removing from heat"@3:28 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
	)
)

content.text: 5) Add salt and pepper, to taste.
content.eamr:
( inst-5 / R
	:inform ( ac-5-0 "Add"@3:6 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-6 "salt and pepper"@7:11 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
		:prp ( purp-5-0 "to taste"@24:32 / PURPOSE_CLAUSE )
	)
)
